TopicTitle: Fortress Watsas Space Industries bids you good day

Articles.Content:
Hello ladies, gentlemen, mentlegen, kerbals, and assorted meats. I am Ironwatsas, representing Fortress Watsas industries space research department. We've recently begun our own space program and have had many successful launches (many kerbals died to obtain this information).

I bid you good day, fellow kerbalnauts, with the hopes that my space program (which is totally not part of a plot to bring about a kerbin technological singularity to use them as a cyborg servitor race) is as successful as yours. I also have many (presumably) exciting and interesting ships as well as ideas I'd like (am forced by our shareholders, who are totally not moon rabbits) to share.
Hello watsas. Good to see you again.
Fancy running into you here. How goes your space adventure today?

Welcome back Ironwatsas

Don't enslave me bro

Have fun and fly safe!
